## Block.setMutator() method

Give this block a mutator dialog.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMutator(_mutator: MutatorIcon): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_mutator | [MutatorIcon](./blockly.icons.mutatoricon.md) | A mutator dialog instance or null to remove. |

**Returns:**

void
